subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yusmeiro Petit, who was called up yesterday from Class AAA Tucson to replace the injured Randy Johnson, pitched into the sixth inning last night for the Arizona Diamondbacks in a 7-1 victory over the Cardinals in St. Louis.
snippet: Yusmeiro Petit, who was called up yesterday from Class AAA Tucson to replace the injured Randy Johnson, pitched into the sixth inning last night for the Arizona Diamondbacks in a 7-1 victory over the Cardinals in St. Louis.
